Information

Don't need 1,000Mbps? We give you more options so you can use, and pay only for what you need. You require a bitrate of 600Mbs that is only $13.00 USD in addition to your service plan. Need to double your monthly transfer capability that is only $8.50 USD more. For 2,000GB of monthly transfer we have a low monthly fee of $5.50 USD.

We have been operating in the datacomm industry for over 14 years.

Ask about our well priced dedicated server options.
